item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @anari111 anari111
item.description:
@anari111 wrote:

I was wondering if i add these :

gameGraphics.drawString("@gre@Username: @whi@" + ourPlayer.name + "", 5, 130 + 10, 1, 0xffffff); gameGraphics.drawString("@gre@Combat Level: @whi@" + ourPlayer.level + "", 5, 143 + 10, 1, 0xffffff); gameGraphics.drawString("@gre@Coords: (X: @whi@" + (sectionX + areaX) + "@gre@, Y: @whi@" + (sectionY + areaY) + "@gre@)", 5, 156 + 10, 1, 0xffffff); gameGraphics.drawString("@gre@Prayer: @whi@" + playerStatCurrent[5] + "@gre@/@whi@" + playerStatBase[5] + "", 5, 169 + 10, 1, 0xffffff); gameGraphics.drawString("@gre@Fatigue: @whi@" + fatigue + "@gre@%", 5, 182 + 10, 1, 0xffffff);

from yong tutorial.
How can i add a hotkey like F5 to hide/show them ?

Also would like to have ::say cmd working for players.

Read full topic
